name: dart:io.SocketOption

props.example:
Implementation

static const SocketOption TCP_NODELAY = tcpNoDelay
props.name: TCP_NODELAY

props.desc:
Enable or disable no-delay on the socket. If tcpNoDelay is enabled, the socket will not buffer data internally, but instead write each data chunk as an individual TCP packet.

tcpNoDelay is disabled by default.
props.example:
Implementation

static const SocketOption tcpNoDelay = const SocketOption._(0)
props.name: tcpNoDelay

desc: The SocketOption is used as a parameter to Socket.setOption and RawSocket.setOption to set customize the behaviour of the underlying socket.
